text: Model Sarah Stage earned the nickname ` ` Six - Pack Mom'' when her abdominal definition remained intact throughout her first pregnancy. Now seven months pregnant with her second child, she recently posted a loud, clear, and sweaty message dedicated to the haters who continue to troll her : In the video above, Sarah is working out like it ain't no thang â€” despite the fact that a few weeks ago, her followers critiqued the safety of her prenatal workouts.
